data.name: Matt Tifft Comeback Pack
data.detailed_description:
After taking some time off, Matt Tifft is back in the driver seat! To celebrate Matt Tifft’s return to NASCAR, pick up the Matt Tifft Comeback Pack which features fantasy Paint Schemes, Challenges and Spotter Audio from Matt.
 
Includes the following:

Paint Schemes
o Matt Tifft – Brain Gear
o Matt Tifft – Tunity Digital
o Matt Tifft – Surface Sunscreen

Challenges
o "Tifft on the Team"
o "Dreamin' of 'Dega"

Spotter Audio

data.short_description: After taking some time off, Matt Tifft is back in the driver seat! To celebrate Matt Tifft’s return to NASCAR, pick up the Matt Tifft Comeback Pack which features fantasy Paint Schemes, Challenges and Spotter Audio from Matt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better Nvidia GTX460 or better Series, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better Nvidia GTX460 or better Series, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better
